# Open, reproducible digital health studies — end to end

momenTUM is an open research platform for designing and deploying mobile studies, collecting ambulatory assessment data, and exploring results through a web-based dashboard.  
It supports reproducible workflows for researchers and a seamless experience for study participants.
:::
